title: Steam Next Fest returns with more demos and livestreams
description: Time load up that Steam downloads list because Steam Next Fest is here once again, and there's a whole lot of demos for you to try out.

title: Life by You the Sims-like from Paradox delayed until June
description: Life by You from Paradox Tectonic / Paradox Interactive has suffered a fresh delay and will now not hit Early Access until June.

title: The new Skate from EA will be coming to Steam
description: The next-generation Skate is now confirmed to getting a PC release on Steam, so thankfully you won't have to deal with the EA App directly.

title: NonSteamLaunchers for Steam Deck expands automatic game shortcuts for more stores
description: NonSteamLaunchers is a project to help you easily install various external launchers / game stores on Steam Deck like EA App, Battle.net, Amazon, GOG Galaxy, Ubisoft and more. Recent releases have much improved automatic shortcut creation in your Steam Library.

title: Super Pocket Taito Edition Review - Licensed Linux Retro-gaming on a Budget
description: Blaze Entertainment's latest Evercade-compatible device makes for an excellent entry to licensed emulation on Linux.

title: Steam Deck open source Playstation Remote Play app 'chiaki4deck' gets smoother
description: A smoother stream, bug fixes and extra features are here for chiaki4deck, the open source Playstation Remote Play client for Steam Deck in the latest release.

title: Orange Pi Neo gaming handheld to come with Manjaro Linux
description: Shown off during the recent FOSDEM 2024 event, it seems the Manjaro Linux team have buddied up with hardware vendor Orange Pi for the Orange Pi Neo gaming handheld.

title: Deep Rock Galactic: Survivor hits Early Access on February 14th
description: What could be my next favourite horde survival game and an off-shoot of one of the best online co-op games around, Deep Rock Galactic: Survivor is launching in Early Access on February 14th.
